sentences.en: Doubling the frequency of logical operations inside a microprocessor doubles the heat output.
sentences.cn: 微处理器内部逻辑操作的频率加倍，产生的热量也加倍。

sentences.en: Heat is released every time a logical operation is performed inside a microprocessor, so the faster the processor is, the more heat it generates.
sentences.cn: 微处理器每次在内部执行逻辑操作时都会释放热量，因此处理器运行得越快，产生的热量就越多。

sentences.en: Every year you can come up with microprocessor architecture.
sentences.cn: 每年你都可以提出微处理器架构。
